entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, referred to as 'Harry' by Hagrid. (e.g. 'He looked at Harry for a moment...')

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A gamekeeper and teacher at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, who is supportive of Harry. (e.g. 'an’ now look at yeh, Harry! School champion!’)

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, mentioned by Hagrid as an example of someone who values ability over bloodline. (e.g. 'Dumble-dore’s the one who’s got it righ’')

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, mentioned as accompanying Harry back to the castle. (e.g. 'Harry went back to the castle later that afternoon with Ron and Hermione...')

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: One of Harry's friends at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, mentioned as accompanying Harry back to the castle. (e.g. 'Harry went back to the castle later that afternoon with Ron and Hermione...')

entities.name: egg
entities.description: An object that Hagrid is interested in, which Harry is taking care of. (e.g. 'How you doin’ wi th that egg, Harry?’)

relationships.description: Hagrid encourages Harry to win the school championship and prove himself. (e.g. 'Yeh know what I’d love, Harry? I’d love yeh ter win...')
Hagrid admires Dumbledore for his values and approach to teaching. (e.g. 'Dumble-dore’s the one who’s got it righ’')
Harry is taking care of an egg, which Hagrid is interested in. (e.g. 'How you doin’ wi th that egg, Harry?’)
Harry and Ron are friends at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. (e.g. 'Harry went back to the castle later that afternoon with Ron and Hermione...')
